document.full_text: taliban-led insurgents killed at least 11 people across afghanistan in a renewed springtime offensive on sunday despite a huge security clampdown, hours after the united nations pleaded for all sides to avoid civilian casualties.
document.title: taliban renew afghan offensive despite u.n. plea
lines_and_colors: taliban-led insurgents killed at least 11 people across afghanistan in a renewed springtime offensive on sunday despite a huge security clampdown, hours after the united nations pleaded for all sides to avoid civilian casualties.
